description:
Beerus is convinced that his actions should’ve influenced the future, but Future Trunks isn’t so sure! Now it’s time for Goku, Vegeta, and Future Trunks to see for themselves—and Bulma is going, too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Back to the Future: Goku Black`s Identity Is Revealed!!
Es geht wieder in die Zukunft! – Blacks wahre Identität kommt ans Licht!
Futatabi Mirai e: Akasareru Gokuu Black no Shoutai!!
再び未来へ 明かされるゴクウブラックの正体!!
